title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 700.7 - Severability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 700.7 - Severability

State Regulations

If any provision of this Part or the application thereof to
any person or circumstances is adjudged invalid by a court of competent
jurisdiction, such judgment shall not affect or impair the validity of the
other provisions of this Part or the application thereof to other persons or
circumstances. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
700.7

Adopted

New

York State Register December 20, 2017 /Volume XXXIX, Issue 51, eff. 12/20/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
